alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Marion (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 1:51PM PST until December 23 at 5:51AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Polk and Benton Counties. For the Willamette River Tributaries...including Philomath, Suver, Aurora...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM PST Tuesday the stage was estimated to be 22.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 22.3 feet late tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 10 PM PST.
